analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rdo rje'i bu mo zhes pa mi phyed pa nyid las rdo rje dang 'od gsal ba nyid las bu mo @118b ste ;
translated: For that very reason, the daughter of the vajra is so called because of indivisibility, and because of luminosity, she is a daughter.

original: sdud pa'i ngo bo nyid gsal ba'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: sdud pa'i ngo bo nyid gsal ba'i bdag nyid do //
translated: She is the nature of the essence of the aggregate of discernment.

original: 'di zhes pa de lta bur gyur pa'i rdo rje'i bu mo gzung zhing mngon sum du byas nas gnas par 'os zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes pa de lta bur gyur pa'i rdo rje'i bu mo gzung zhing mngon sum du byas nas gnas par 'os zhes pa'o //
translated: Having taken hold of that vajra daughter, who is like that, and made manifest, she is worthy of being abiding.

original: rdo rje'i rigs med rang 'dod kyi //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rigs med rang 'dod kyi //
translated: The vajra family does not exist,

original: lha yi rigs kyis kyang bya'o //
analyzed: lha yi rigs kyis kyang bya'o //
translated: but one should do it with the family of one's deity.

original: zhes pa / mi phyed pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: zhes pa / mi phyed pa'i rang bzhin te /
translated: The nature of the vajra family is indivisibility.

original: 'dis rigs su bya ba dang / bgrang bar bya ba dang / yongs su gcad par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje'i rigs so //
analyzed: 'dis rigs su bya ba dang / bgrang bar bya ba dang / yongs su gcad par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje'i rigs so //
translated: Because of that, the vajra family is to be done, to be counted, and to be defined.

original: tshul 'dis dngos po yod pa ma yin pa ni med de /
analyzed: tshul 'dis dngos po yod pa ma yin pa ni med de /
translated: By this method, non-existent things do not exist.

original: de'i phyir rdo rje'i rigs med bdag med ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir rdo rje'i rigs med bdag med ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, the vajra family does not exist because of not realizing Nairātmya.

original: rang 'dod lha'i rigs kyis kyang bya'o zhes pa rang gi sgras rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: rang 'dod lha'i rigs kyis kyang bya'o zhes pa rang gi sgras rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The word “own” means consciousness.

original: 'dod lha zhes pa rnam par shes pa des /
analyzed: 'dod lha zhes pa rnam par shes pa des /
translated: The “desired deity” is the consciousness.

original: 'dod pa dang 'brel zhing khyab pa'i lha me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang 'brel zhing khyab pa'i lha me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: The deity that is related to and pervades the desire is the nature of the five pristine consciousnesses, such as the mirror-like pristine consciousness.

original: de'i rigs de yongs su bcad pas so //
analyzed: de'i rigs de yongs su bcad pas so //
translated: The “type” is the determination of that.

original: kyang zhes pa gnyis po yang tha dad med par bya ba ste /
analyzed: kyang zhes pa gnyis po yang tha dad med par bya ba ste /
translated: “Also” means that the two are not different.

original: kun du bzang po'i spyod pa la zhugs pa'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: kun du bzang po'i spyod pa la zhugs pa'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: “Engaged in the conduct of Samantabhadra” is the intention.

original: yang na zhes pa phyogs gzhan te /
analyzed: yang na zhes pa phyogs gzhan te /
translated: “Also” means another position.

original: gzhan gyi rigs byung la zhes pa gzhan ni gcig ste lhan cig ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi rigs byung la zhes pa gzhan ni gcig ste lhan cig ma yin pa'o //
translated: “Arisen from another type” means that another is one, not a companion.

original: des rigs yongs su bcad pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan gyi rigs te rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: des rigs yongs su bcad pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan gyi rigs te rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: The determination of that type is “another type,” which is Vajradhara.

original: de byung pa ni 'khrungs pa dang skyes par gyur pa rab tu gsal pa 'khor ba kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: de byung pa ni 'khrungs pa dang skyes par gyur pa rab tu gsal pa 'khor ba kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: “Arisen from that” is the arising, birth, and appearance of the nature of the relative truth of samsāra.

original: la ni / gang gi bdag med ma ste /
analyzed: la ni / gang gi bdag med ma ste /
translated: And in the Laghutantra: She is Nairatmya,

original: de ni don dam pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni don dam pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: and she is the nature of ultimate truth.

original: de'i khyad par ci zhe na /
analyzed: de'i khyad par ci zhe na /
translated: What is her distinction?

original: byang chub sa bon btab pa yis //
analyzed: byang chub sa bon btab pa yis //
translated: By planting the seed of enlightenment,

original: byang chub ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: byang chub ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes te /
translated: enlightenment is nonconceptual intuition,

original: de nyid sa bon no //
analyzed: de nyid sa bon no //
translated: and that itself is the seed.

original: de btab pa ni bskyed pa ste /
analyzed: de btab pa ni bskyed pa ste /
translated: Planting it is producing it,

original: des sbyangs pa 'dus byas pa'i rang bzhin kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid do //🔽'dis ni kun rdzab kyi bden pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis don dam pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin nyid dang / de'i don dam pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin gyis kyang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i rang bzhin kho na'o zhes pa ste /
analyzed: des sbyangs pa 'dus byas pa'i rang bzhin kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid do // 'dis ni kun rdzab kyi bden pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis don dam pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin nyid dang / de'i don dam pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin gyis kyang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i rang bzhin kho na'o zhes pa ste /
translated: and by that, the nature of the purified relative is the nature of ultimate truth.

original: gnyis ka dbyer med pa bdag med me'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa thugs rdo rje lha'i le'ur mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis ka dbyer med pa bdag med me'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa thugs rdo rje lha'i le'ur mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
translated: This shows that by the nature of the relative truth, there is the nature of the ultimate truth, and by the nature of the ultimate truth, there is the nature of the relative truth, and so both are inseparable. Nairatmya is the yoga of Nairatmya, and the triad of vajras is inseparable, as was briefly indicated in the chapter on the deity of mind-vajra.🔽This is the extensive explanation.

original: de ltar gyur pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa spyod pa la dga' ba des gal te dga' ba'i dbang gis glu len pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa spyod pa la dga' ba des gal te dga' ba'i dbang gis glu len pa de'i tshe /
translated: The yogi who is endowed with the seal that has become such, who delights in conduct, if he sings out of delight,

original: @119a * // de ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: @119a * // de ci ltar zhe na /
translated: what is that like?🔽It is said:

original: gsungs pa / gal te dga' bas glu blangs te /
analyzed: gsungs pa / gal te dga' bas glu blangs te /
translated: If he sings out of delight,

original: de tshe rdo rje mchog ldan no //
analyzed: de tshe rdo rje mchog ldan no //
translated: then he is endowed with the supreme vajra.

original: des rdo rje'i glu nyid blang bar bya ste//
analyzed: des rdo rje'i glu nyid blang bar bya ste//
translated: He should sing the vajra song itself,

original: de nyid mchog rmad du byung ba zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid mchog rmad du byung ba zhes pa'o //
translated: which is the supreme, marvelous.

original: gal te dga' ba skyes pa na //
analyzed: gal te dga' ba skyes pa na //
translated: If he is born with delight,

original: thar pa rgyu yis gar bya ste //
analyzed: thar pa rgyu yis gar bya ste //
translated: he should dance with the cause of liberation.

original: de tshe rdo rje rkang pas gar //
analyzed: de tshe rdo rje rkang pas gar //
translated: Then, with the vajra foot,

original: yo g'i'i mnyam par gzhag pas bya //
analyzed: yo g'i'i mnyam par gzhag pas bya //
translated: he should dance with the yoga equipoise.

original: gal te rnal 'byor pa gar gyi rtsom pa la 'jug par dga' ba skyes par gyur pa de'i tshe gar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te rnal 'byor pa gar gyi rtsom pa la 'jug par dga' ba skyes par gyur pa de'i tshe gar bya'o //
translated: If the yogi is born with delight in engaging in the composition of dance, then he should dance.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By what?

original: rdo rje rkang pas ji ltar dpal he ru kar gnas pa'i rkang pas chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid kyi ro mnan pa de bzhin du rdo rje rkang pa g-yas brkyang la sogs pa rnams kyi rkang stabs rnams kyis mnyam par gzhag pa sems de kho nas 'khyud
analyzed: rdo rje rkang pas ji ltar dpal he ru kar gnas pa'i rkang pas chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid kyi ro mnan pa de bzhin du rdo rje rkang pa g-yas brkyang la sogs pa rnams kyi rkang stabs rnams kyis mnyam par gzhag pa sems de kho nas 'khyud
translated: Just as the glorious Heruka, with his feet, tramples on the corpse which is the nature of the dharmadhatu, in the same way, with the dance steps of the right foot extended and so forth, the yogin embraces the mind of meditative equipoise with just that mind.

original: pa'o // yang na /
analyzed: pa'o // yang na /
translated: Or else,

original: de kho na'i rnal 'byor pa des glu a'a li k'a li n'a da'i bdag nyid kyi sgra ste /
analyzed: de kho na'i rnal 'byor pa des glu a'a li k'a li n'a da'i bdag nyid kyi sgra ste /
translated: that yogin of reality, with the sound of the song, the nature of the ali and kali,

original: len pa ni sgra yul du byed pa'o //
analyzed: len pa ni sgra yul du byed pa'o //
translated: takes up, makes the sound an object.

original: sgra las sgra la zhugs ba'i phyir cha dang bral ba nyid kyis dga' ba'o //
analyzed: sgra las sgra la zhugs ba'i phyir cha dang bral ba nyid kyis dga' ba'o //
translated: Because of the sound, he enters into sound, and is delighted by the absence of parts.

original: rgyu de'i phyir de'i tshe de'i dus na rdo rje ldan pa mi phyed pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa nyid de mchog rmad du byung ba ji srid mchog dga'i mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu de'i phyir de'i tshe de'i dus na rdo rje ldan pa mi phyed pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa nyid de mchog rmad du byung ba ji srid mchog dga'i mthar thug pa'o //
translated: For that reason, at that time, he is endowed with the vajra, endowed with the indivisible gnosis, the supreme, the marvelous, to the extent of the ultimate of supreme joy.

original: rdo rje gsum mi phyed cing dbyer med pa las dbang bskur ba'i le'ur mdong bstan pa'i don rgyas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum mi phyed cing dbyer med pa las dbang bskur ba'i le'ur mdong bstan pa'i don rgyas par bshad pa'o //
translated: The chapter on the consecration from the indivisibility of the three vajras, which is the extensive explanation of the meaning indicated in the concise explanation.

original: gal te de'i tshe khyad par gyi dga' ba skyes pa na gar ni g-yo ba ste /
analyzed: gal te de'i tshe khyad par gyi dga' ba skyes pa na gar ni g-yo ba ste /
translated: If at that time the special joy arises, one should dance, which is to move.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: thar pa'i rgyus grol ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: thar pa'i rgyus grol ba'i don du'o //
translated: For the sake of liberation through the cause of liberation.

original: de ltar de'i tshe rdo rje rkang pas mi phyed pa'i ye shes dga' ba la sogs pa rnams kyis gar bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar de'i tshe rdo rje rkang pas mi phyed pa'i ye shes dga' ba la sogs pa rnams kyis gar bya ste /
translated: Thus, at that time, one should dance with the vajra feet, with the gnosis of indivisibility, with joy, and so on.

original: gar ni nges pa med pa dag nas pa'o //
analyzed: gar ni nges pa med pa dag nas pa'o //
translated: Dancing is to move in an unpredictable manner.

original: de bya ba ni nges pa med par gnas pa bskyed pa ste /
analyzed: de bya ba ni nges pa med par gnas pa bskyed pa ste /
translated: That is to be done, which is to generate an unpredictable state.

original: de'i phyir yo g'i'i gnyis ka dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir yo g'i'i gnyis ka dbyer med pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the yoga is the indivisibility of the two.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mnyam par gzhag pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mnyam par gzhag pa ste /
translated: For that very reason, it is equipoise,

original: mi mnyam pa med par gnas pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: mi mnyam pa med par gnas pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: which means to abide without inequality.

original: 'dis ni ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi de kho na ste /
analyzed: 'dis ni ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi de kho na ste /
translated: This is the reality that is the nature of the five gnoses,

original: de kho na'i le'ur mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na'i le'ur mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
translated: the extensive explanation of the concise explanation in the chapter on reality.

original: da ni gang zhig rnal 'byor pas 'dzin pa rus pa'i rgyan la sogs pa /
analyzed: da ni gang zhig rnal 'byor pas 'dzin pa rus pa'i rgyan la sogs pa /
translated: Now, the yogi's ornaments of bone and so forth that are to be taken up are taught.

original: de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa gsungs pa /
translated: The purity of those is taught.

original: 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis mi bskyod pa //🔽zhes pa / spyi bor 'khor lo rnam par 'dzin //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis mi bskyod pa // zhes pa / spyi bor 'khor lo rnam par 'dzin //
translated: Akshobhya is in the form of a wheel.

original: zhes pa mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
translated: The brief explanation of on the head, one should hold a wheel is the extensive explanation.

original: rna cha'i bdag nyid 'od dpag med //🔽rna bar lha yi rna cha'o //
analyzed: rna cha'i bdag nyid 'od dpag med // rna bar lha yi rna cha'o //
translated: Amitabha is in the nature of earrings.

original: @119b zhes mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: @119b zhes mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
translated: The brief explanation of in the ears, divine earrings is the extensive explanation.

original: mgul pa'i phreng ba rin chen dbang //
analyzed: mgul pa'i phreng ba rin chen dbang //
translated: Ratnasambhava is a necklace.

original: zhes pa mgul par rus pa'i phreng ba'o zhes gang gsungs pa'o //🔽lag par rnam par snang mdzad brjod //🔽ces pa / lag pa dag la lag gdub gnyis //
analyzed: zhes pa mgul par rus pa'i phreng ba'o zhes gang gsungs pa'o // lag par rnam par snang mdzad brjod // ces pa / lag pa dag la lag gdub gnyis //
translated: This is the brief explanation of around the neck, a bone necklace.🔽Vairochana is on the hands.

original: zhes pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: This is the brief explanation of on the hands, two bracelets.

original: ska rags la ni don yod gnas //🔽zhes pa / rked pa la yang ska rags nyid //
analyzed: ska rags la ni don yod gnas // zhes pa / rked pa la yang ska rags nyid //
translated: Amoghasiddhi is on the belt.

original: ces pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: ces pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: This is the brief explanation of on the hips, a bone belt.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rnam par dag pa phyag rgya'i sgras lha'i le'ur gsungs po /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rnam par dag pa phyag rgya'i sgras lha'i le'ur gsungs po /
translated: The purity of the five transcendent ones is taught in the chapter on the deities with the term “seal.”🔽Wheel, earrings, necklace,

original: 'khor lo rna cha mgul rgyan dang // lag gdub dang ni ska rags nyid //🔽sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pas //
analyzed: 'khor lo rna cha mgul rgyan dang // lag gdub dang ni ska rags nyid // sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pas //
translated: armlet, and belt.🔽These are well known as seals,

original: 'di rnams phyag rgyar rab tu grags //
analyzed: 'di rnams phyag rgyar rab tu grags //
translated: through the purity of the five transcendent ones.

original: zhes pa'o // 'di ni mkha' 'gro ma'i rnam par dag pa rnams kyang ste /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // 'di ni mkha' 'gro ma'i rnam par dag pa rnams kyang ste /
translated: These are also the purities of the dakinis.

original: de rnams rus pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan no zhes gsungs pa des na /
analyzed: de rnams rus pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan no zhes gsungs pa des na /
translated: Since it is said that “those are the ornaments of the bone garland,”

original: rkang pa dag la rkang gdub ste //
analyzed: rkang pa dag la rkang gdub ste //
translated: ankle bells are on the ankles.

original: rkang pa dag la shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin a'a li k'a li n'a da'i bdag nyid rnam par dag pa'i rkang gdub po //
analyzed: rkang pa dag la shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin a'a li k'a li n'a da'i bdag nyid rnam par dag pa'i rkang gdub po //
translated: The purity of the nature of wisdom and method, which is the nature of the vowels and consonants, is the ankle bells on the ankles.

original: dpung pa'i rtsa bar dpung rgyan no //🔽zhes pa gnyis ka dbyer med pa rdo rje 'chang rnam par dag pa nyid rgyan te /
analyzed: dpung pa'i rtsa bar dpung rgyan no // zhes pa gnyis ka dbyer med pa rdo rje 'chang rnam par dag pa nyid rgyan te /
translated: The armlet is on the base of the arm.

original: spro ba dang sdud pa'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: spro ba dang sdud pa'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: The purity of Vajradhara, who is the indivisibility of both, is the ornament that has the nature of emanating and gathering.

original: bgo ba stag gi pags pa nyid //
analyzed: bgo ba stag gi pags pa nyid //
translated: The garment is the skin of a tiger.

original: ces pa // de rnams nyid spro ba'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: ces pa // de rnams nyid spro ba'i rang bzhin no //
translated: They are the nature of expansion.

original: bza' ba mi 'chi bcu phyed de //
analyzed: bza' ba mi 'chi bcu phyed de //
translated: The food is the half-month of immortality.

original: zhes pa / de rnams nyid sdud pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: zhes pa / de rnams nyid sdud pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: They are the nature of gathering.

original: yang na / mi bskyod pa ni bskyod pa med cing g-yo ba med pa ste /
analyzed: yang na / mi bskyod pa ni bskyod pa med cing g-yo ba med pa ste /
translated: Or else, Akshobhya is without movement and without vibration.

original: mi bskyod pa g-yo ba med pa'i rang bzhin /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa g-yo ba med pa'i rang bzhin /
translated: Akshobhya is the nature of immobility.

original: mi shes pa gcod pa'i rnam pas 'khor lo'i gzugs so //🔽rna cha'i bdag nyid 'od dpag med //
analyzed: mi shes pa gcod pa'i rnam pas 'khor lo'i gzugs so // rna cha'i bdag nyid 'od dpag med //
translated: The form of a wheel by the aspect of cutting off ignorance.🔽The nature of earrings is Amitabha.

original: dpag tu med pa'i 'od ni 'od dpag med de /
analyzed: dpag tu med pa'i 'od ni 'od dpag med de /
translated: The immeasurable light is Amitabha.

original: spro ba'i rang bzhin gyi bya ba gang yin pa de 'od dpag med do //
analyzed: spro ba'i rang bzhin gyi bya ba gang yin pa de 'od dpag med do //
translated: That which is the nature of expansion is Amitabha.

original: ci ltar rna cha'i bdag nyid ce na bskor ba'i ngo bo khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ci ltar rna cha'i bdag nyid ce na bskor ba'i ngo bo khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i don to //
translated: How is it the nature of earrings? It is the nature of pervading the essence of the circle.

original: dga' ba rgyas pa'i phyir rin chen ni sems so //
analyzed: dga' ba rgyas pa'i phyir rin chen ni sems so //
translated: The jewel is the mind, because it expands delight.

original: de'i dbang po ni gtso bo ste /
analyzed: de'i dbang po ni gtso bo ste /
translated: Its organ is the principal one.

original: de mgul pa'i phreng bar stong pa nyid bcu drug gi rang bzhin la zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de mgul pa'i phreng bar stong pa nyid bcu drug gi rang bzhin la zhes pa'o //
translated: That is the garland of the neck, the nature of the sixteen emptinesses.

original: lag par rnam par snang mdzad brjod //
analyzed: lag par rnam par snang mdzad brjod //
translated: Vairocana is said to be the hand.🔽This is the ascertainment of the two, the sense faculties and the five objects.

original: ces pa dbang po dang yul lnga'i bdag nyid gnyis la rnam par nges pa dang / snang mdzad gsal ba'i rnam pas gnas pa'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: ces pa dbang po dang yul lnga'i bdag nyid gnyis la rnam par nges pa dang / snang mdzad gsal ba'i rnam pas gnas pa'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: Vairocana is so called because he abides in the aspect of clear appearance.

original: ska rags chos 'byung la tha dad @120a * //
analyzed: ska rags chos 'byung la tha dad @120a * //
translated: The belt is the source of phenomena, abiding without distinction.

original: pa med par gnas pa don yod de don med ma yin pa 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba byed par brjod do zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: pa med par gnas pa don yod de don med ma yin pa 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba byed par brjod do zhes pa'i don to //
translated: It is Amoghasiddhi, not futile, performing the activity of the purpose of the world. This is the meaning.

original: kha tv'am gzugs shes rab ste //
analyzed: kha tv'am gzugs shes rab ste //
translated: The sword is wisdom.

original: zhes pa / rdo rje'i rigs dang rang 'dod lha'i rigs dang gzhan gyi rigs las byung ba rnams khyer nas spyod pa bya bar rtogs par bya zhes gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes pa / rdo rje'i rigs dang rang 'dod lha'i rigs dang gzhan gyi rigs las byung ba rnams khyer nas spyod pa bya bar rtogs par bya zhes gang gsungs pa /
translated: This is understood to be the conduct of taking the vajra family, the deity family of one’s desire, and the other families.

original: de'i rnam par dag pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i rnam par dag pa gsungs pa /
translated: The purity of that is stated:

original: kha tv'am gzugs shes rab ste /
analyzed: kha tv'am gzugs shes rab ste /
translated: The sword is wisdom.

original: zhes pa kha tv'am g-yang g-yon pa nas zhes gsungs pa de yang shes rab kyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: zhes pa kha tv'am g-yang g-yon pa nas zhes gsungs pa de yang shes rab kyi rang bzhin te /
translated: The sword, which is said to be taken from the left side, is also the nature of wisdom.

original: 'di ni rnal 'byor pas kha tv'am g-yang gzung bar bya zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rnal 'byor pas kha tv'am g-yang gzung bar bya zhes pa'o //
translated: This is what the yogi should hold, the khaṭvāṅga or the staff.🔽Or else,

original: yang na / kha tv'am ga gzugs shes rab ste //
analyzed: yang na / kha tv'am ga gzugs shes rab ste //
translated: the khaṭvāṅga is wisdom.

original: zhes pa / mkha' la 'gro ba'i phyir kha tv'am ga mkha' spyod ma'o //
analyzed: zhes pa / mkha' la 'gro ba'i phyir kha tv'am ga mkha' spyod ma'o //
translated: Because it moves in the sky, the khaṭvāṅga is the sky-goer.

original: de nyid kyi phyir aam ga'i gzugs te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir aam ga'i gzugs te /
translated: For that very reason, it is the form of Aṅga.

original: aam rtogs shing khong du chud pa'i phyir /
analyzed: aam rtogs shing khong du chud pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it realizes and comprehends A, it is Aṅga.

original: aam ga'o // 'di'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de shes rab ste shes rab kyi sgras aa yig la sogs pa dbyangs bcu bzhi rjes su zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: aam ga'o // 'di'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de shes rab ste shes rab kyi sgras aa yig la sogs pa dbyangs bcu bzhi rjes su zhugs pa'o //
translated: What is its nature? That is wisdom. The word wisdom is understood to include the fourteen vowels beginning with A.

original: 'dis ni mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga ste /
analyzed: 'dis ni mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga ste /
translated: By this, the fifteen dakinis are mentioned.

original: a'a li k'a li'i n'a da zhes brjod do //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li'i n'a da zhes brjod do //
translated: They are called the nāda of Alikāli.

original: thabs kyi gzugs kyis cang te 'u //
analyzed: thabs kyi gzugs kyis cang te 'u //
translated: The hand-drum is the form of method.

original: zhes pa de cang te'u yang gzung bar bya ste de yang thabs rnam par dag pas thabs kyi gzugs kyis so //
analyzed: zhes pa de cang te'u yang gzung bar bya ste de yang thabs rnam par dag pas thabs kyi gzugs kyis so //
translated: The hand-drum should also be held. It is also the form of method because of pure method.🔽Or else,

original: yang na / thabs kyi gzugs kyis cang te'u //
analyzed: yang na / thabs kyi gzugs kyis cang te'u //
translated: the hand-drum is the form of method.

original: zhes pa / rigs lnga la ni rnam par gnas //
analyzed: zhes pa / rigs lnga la ni rnam par gnas //
translated: It is present in the five families.

original: gang gsungs pa de'i rgyas par bshad pa ste /
analyzed: gang gsungs pa de'i rgyas par bshad pa ste /
translated: This is the extensive explanation of what was said.

original: cang te'u sgra'i rang bzhin nyid las n'a da'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: cang te'u sgra'i rang bzhin nyid las n'a da'i bdag nyid do //
translated: From the nature of the sound of the hand drum, it is the nature of nāda.

original: de yang thabs kyi rang bzhin k'a li'i n'a da zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de yang thabs kyi rang bzhin k'a li'i n'a da zhes pa'i don to //
translated: And that is the meaning of the word kāli nāda, which is the nature of method.

original: 'dis ni a'a li dang k'a li'i n'a da gnyis ka'i bdag nyid kyis rnal 'byor par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni a'a li dang k'a li'i n'a da gnyis ka'i bdag nyid kyis rnal 'byor par 'gyur te /
translated: By this, one becomes a yogin by the nature of both āli and kāli nāda.

original: ci ltar zhe sdang rnam dag mi bskyod pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci ltar zhe sdang rnam dag mi bskyod pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: How so? Because of the purity of anger, the purity of Akṣobhya.🔽Or else,

original: yang na / zhe sdang rnam dag rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: yang na / zhe sdang rnam dag rnal 'byor pa //
translated: the yogin of pure anger

original: zhes pa / he ru ka sbyor skyes bu ste //
analyzed: zhes pa / he ru ka sbyor skyes bu ste //
translated: is the person born from the union of Heruka.

original: zhes gang gsungs pa de'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes gang gsungs pa de'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the extensive explanation of what was said.🔽Or else,

original: yang na / zhe sdang rnam dag rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: yang na / zhe sdang rnam dag rnal 'byor pa //
translated: the yogin of pure anger

original: zhes pa / gnyis ka dbyer med pa nyid kyis rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa / gnyis ka dbyer med pa nyid kyis rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: is a yogin by the indivisibility of both.

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhe sdang ngo //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhe sdang ngo //
translated: And that is anger.

original: de yang 'od dpag med la sogs pa'i rang bzhin las rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: de yang 'od dpag med la sogs pa'i rang bzhin las rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: And that is the various aspects from the nature of Amitābha, and so on.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: And for that very reason,

original: rigs gcig pa dang dum yis //
analyzed: rigs gcig pa dang dum yis //
translated: The one class and the half

original: gang phyir dbye ba mtshon @120b mi bya //
analyzed: gang phyir dbye ba mtshon @120b mi bya //
translated: are not indicated by the division.

original: zhes pa'o // 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang / n'a da gnyis ka'i bdag nyid shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag par gyur pa /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang / n'a da gnyis ka'i bdag nyid shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag par gyur pa /
translated: The purities of the wheel, etc. , are Akshobhya, etc. , and the two nada-s are the nature of wisdom and means.

original: zhe sdang rnam dag rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: zhe sdang rnam dag rnal 'byor pa //
translated: The yogi/ni of the purity of anger

original: rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: becomes the nature of Vajradhara.

original: 'dis ni rnal 'byor pa'i phyag rgya lnga gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dis ni rnal 'byor pa'i phyag rgya lnga gsungs te /
translated: This teaches the five mudras of the yogi/ni.

original: de'i rnam par dag pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i rnam par dag pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Their purities are Akshobhya, etc.

original: rkang gdub ni shes rab dang thabs rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: rkang gdub ni shes rab dang thabs rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The anklet is the purity of wisdom and means.

original: dpung rgyan ni zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: dpung rgyan ni zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The armlet is the purity of anger.

original: stag gi pags pa ni thabs rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: stag gi pags pa ni thabs rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The tiger skin is the purity of means.

original: bza' ba mi 'chi bcu phyed ni shes rab rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: bza' ba mi 'chi bcu phyed ni shes rab rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The half-and-half food is the purity of wisdom.

original: he ru ka sbyor skyes bu ste //
analyzed: he ru ka sbyor skyes bu ste //
translated: The yogi/ni is born from the union of Heruka.

original: zhes pa des rnal 'byor pa rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa des rnal 'byor pa rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: This teaches the purity of the yogi/ni.

original: rigs lnga la ni rnam par gnas //
analyzed: rigs lnga la ni rnam par gnas //
translated: Abiding in the five clans.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa /
translated: Up to:

original: gang phyir dbye ba mtshon mi bya //
analyzed: gang phyir dbye ba mtshon mi bya //
translated: One should not make a division.

original: zhes pa'i bar gyis zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i bar gyis zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: This is the purification of anger.

original: shing gcig la sogs pa yang me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: shing gcig la sogs pa yang me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The solitary tree and so forth are the purification of the five intuitions, such as the mirror-intuition.

original: dben pa dang bas mtha' ni thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: dben pa dang bas mtha' ni thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The solitary place and the forest are the purification of means and insight.

original: spyod pa dngos grub ni rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa shes rab dang thabs rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa dngos grub ni rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa shes rab dang thabs rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The practice and the powers are the purification of means and insight as cause and effect.

original: rdo rje'i bu mo la sogs pa yang gnyis su med pa rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i bu mo la sogs pa yang gnyis su med pa rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The vajra girl and so forth are the purification of nonduality.

original: da ni glu dang gang gyi rnam par dag pa yang bshad par bya ste /🔽glu ni rnam dag sngags su gnas //
analyzed: da ni glu dang gang gyi rnam par dag pa yang bshad par bya ste / glu ni rnam dag sngags su gnas //
translated: Now, the purification of song and dance will be explained.🔽Song is the purification abiding in mantra.

original: zhes pa sgra ni sngags kyi rang bzhin nyid do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa sgra ni sngags kyi rang bzhin nyid do zhes pa'o //
translated: Sound is the nature of mantra.

original: yang na // ye shes kyi rang bzhin n'a da de nyid de /
analyzed: yang na // ye shes kyi rang bzhin n'a da de nyid de /
translated: Or, the nature of intuition is the nada itself.🔽This is the meaning of the verse:

original: 'dis ni / gal te dga' bas glu blangs te //
analyzed: 'dis ni / gal te dga' bas glu blangs te //
translated: If one sings with joy,

original: de tshe rdo rje mchog ldan no //
analyzed: de tshe rdo rje mchog ldan no //
translated: At that time, one is endowed with the supreme vajra.

original: zhes pa de'i rnam par dag pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pa de'i rnam par dag pa gsungs so //
translated: This is the purity of that.

original: gar ni bsgom pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: gar ni bsgom pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: Dancing is the aspect of meditation.
